trans-unit.source: What is Application Insights?
trans-unit.target: What is Application Insights?

trans-unit.source: Track usage and performance of your live web or device application. Detect, triage and diagnose problems. Continuously monitor and improve success with your users.
trans-unit.target: Track usage and performance of your live web or device application. Detect, triage and diagnose problems. Continuously monitor and improve success with your users.

trans-unit.source: What is Application Insights?
trans-unit.target: What is Application Insights?

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is an extensible analytics service that helps you understand the performance and usage of your live application.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is an extensible analytics service that helps you understand the performance and usage of your live application.

trans-unit.source: It's designed for developers, to help you continuously improve the performance and usability of your app.
trans-unit.target: It's designed for developers, to help you continuously improve the performance and usability of your app.

trans-unit.source: It works with both web and stand-alone apps on a wide variety of platforms: .NET or J2EE, hosted on-premises or in the cloud; device apps on Windows, iOS, Android, OSX and other platforms.
trans-unit.target: It works with both web and stand-alone apps on a wide variety of platforms: .NET or J2EE, hosted on-premises or in the cloud; device apps on Windows, iOS, Android, OSX and other platforms.

trans-unit.source: It is aimed at the development team.
trans-unit.target: It is aimed at the development team.

trans-unit.source: With it, you can:
trans-unit.target: With it, you can:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Analyze usage patterns[knowusers]</linkText><title></title></link> to understand your users better and continuously improve your app.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Analyze usage patterns[knowusers]</linkText><title></title></link> to understand your users better and continuously improve your app.

trans-unit.source: Page view counts, new and returning users, geolocation, platforms, and other core usage statistics
trans-unit.target: Page view counts, new and returning users, geolocation, platforms, and other core usage statistics

trans-unit.source: Trace usage paths to assess the success of each feature.
trans-unit.target: Trace usage paths to assess the success of each feature.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Detect, triage and diagnose[detect]</linkText><title></title></link> performance issues and fix them before most of your users are aware.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Detect, triage and diagnose[detect]</linkText><title></title></link> performance issues and fix them before most of your users are aware.

trans-unit.source: Alerts on performance changes or crashes.
trans-unit.target: Alerts on performance changes or crashes.

trans-unit.source: Metrics to help diagnose performance issues, such as response times, CPU usage, dependency tracking.
trans-unit.target: Metrics to help diagnose performance issues, such as response times, CPU usage, dependency tracking.

trans-unit.source: Availability tests for web apps.
trans-unit.target: Availability tests for web apps.

trans-unit.source: Crash and exception reports and alerts
trans-unit.target: Crash and exception reports and alerts

trans-unit.source: Powerful diagnostic log search (including log traces from your favorite logging frameworks).
trans-unit.target: Powerful diagnostic log search (including log traces from your favorite logging frameworks).

trans-unit.source: The SDK for each platform includes a range of modules that monitor the app straight out of the box.
trans-unit.target: The SDK for each platform includes a range of modules that monitor the app straight out of the box.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can code your own telemetry for more detailed and tailored analytics.
trans-unit.target: In addition, you can code your own telemetry for more detailed and tailored analytics.

trans-unit.source: Telemetry data collected from your application is stored and analysed in the Azure Portal, where there are intuitive views and powerful tools for fast diagnosis and analysis.
trans-unit.target: Telemetry data collected from your application is stored and analysed in the Azure Portal, where there are intuitive views and powerful tools for fast diagnosis and analysis.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Chart user activity statistics, or drill into specific events.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Chart user activity statistics, or drill into specific events.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Want even deeper analysis?
trans-unit.target: Want even deeper analysis?

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Export</linkText><title></title></link> your data <link><linkText>to SQL</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>to Power BI</linkText><title></title></link>, or your own tools.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Export</linkText><title></title></link> your data <link><linkText>to SQL</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>to Power BI</linkText><title></title></link>, or your own tools.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Viewing data in Power BI</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Viewing data in Power BI</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Platforms and languages
trans-unit.target: Platforms and languages

trans-unit.source: There are SDKs for a growing range of platforms.
trans-unit.target: There are SDKs for a growing range of platforms.

trans-unit.source: Currently the list includes:
trans-unit.target: Currently the list includes:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>ASP.NET servers[greenbrown]</linkText><title></title></link> on Azure or your IIS server
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>ASP.NET servers[greenbrown]</linkText><title></title></link> on Azure or your IIS server

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Cloud Services</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Cloud Services</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>J2EE servers[java]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>J2EE servers[java]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Web pages[client]</linkText><title></title></link>: HTML+JavaScript
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Web pages[client]</linkText><title></title></link>: HTML+JavaScript

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Windows Phone, Windows Store, Windows 10 universal apps, and direct integration with the Windows 10 developer portal[windows]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Windows Phone, Windows Store, Windows 10 universal apps, and direct integration with the Windows 10 developer portal[windows]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Windows desktop[desktop]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Windows desktop[desktop]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>iOS[ios]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>iOS[ios]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Android[android]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Android[android]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Other platforms[platforms]</linkText><title></title></link> - Node.js, PHP, Python, Ruby, Joomla, SharePoint, WordPress
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Other platforms[platforms]</linkText><title></title></link> - Node.js, PHP, Python, Ruby, Joomla, SharePoint, WordPress

trans-unit.source: Application Insights can also get telemetry from existing ASP.NET web apps on IIS without rebuilding them.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights can also get telemetry from existing ASP.NET web apps on IIS without rebuilding them.

trans-unit.source: If your app has client, server and other components, you can instrument them all.
trans-unit.target: If your app has client, server and other components, you can instrument them all.

trans-unit.source: The data will be integrated in the Application Insights portal so that, for example, you can correlate events at the client with events at the server.
trans-unit.target: The data will be integrated in the Application Insights portal so that, for example, you can correlate events at the client with events at the server.

trans-unit.source: How it works
trans-unit.target: How it works

trans-unit.source: You install a small SDK in your application, and set up an account in the Application Insights portal.
trans-unit.target: You install a small SDK in your application, and set up an account in the Application Insights portal.

trans-unit.source: The SDK monitors your app and sends telemetry data to the portal.
trans-unit.target: The SDK monitors your app and sends telemetry data to the portal.

trans-unit.source: The portal shows you statistical charts and provides powerful search tools to help you diagnose any problems.
trans-unit.target: The portal shows you statistical charts and provides powerful search tools to help you diagnose any problems.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>The Application Insights SDK in your app sends telemetry to your Application Insights resource in the Azure portal.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>The Application Insights SDK in your app sends telemetry to your Application Insights resource in the Azure portal.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The SDK has several modules which collect telemetry, for example to count users, sessions, and performance.
trans-unit.target: The SDK has several modules which collect telemetry, for example to count users, sessions, and performance.

trans-unit.source: You can also write your own custom code to send telemetry data to the portal.
trans-unit.target: You can also write your own custom code to send telemetry data to the portal.

trans-unit.source: Custom telemetry is particularly useful to trace user stories: you can count events such as button clicks, achievement of particular goals, or user mistakes.
trans-unit.target: Custom telemetry is particularly useful to trace user stories: you can count events such as button clicks, achievement of particular goals, or user mistakes.

trans-unit.source: For ASP.NET servers and Azure web apps, you can also install <link><linkText>Status Monitor[redfield]</linkText><title></title></link>, which has two uses.
trans-unit.target: For ASP.NET servers and Azure web apps, you can also install <link><linkText>Status Monitor[redfield]</linkText><title></title></link>, which has two uses.

trans-unit.source: It lets you:
trans-unit.target: It lets you:

trans-unit.source: Monitor a web app without re-building or re-installing it.
trans-unit.target: Monitor a web app without re-building or re-installing it.

trans-unit.source: Track calls to dependent modules.
trans-unit.target: Track calls to dependent modules.

trans-unit.source: What's the overhead?
trans-unit.target: What's the overhead?

trans-unit.source: The impact on your performance is very small.
trans-unit.target: The impact on your performance is very small.

trans-unit.source: Tracking calls non-blocking, and are batched and sent in a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: Tracking calls non-blocking, and are batched and sent in a separate thread.

trans-unit.source: To get started
trans-unit.target: To get started

trans-unit.source: You'll need a subscription to <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You'll need a subscription to <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: It's free to sign up, and you can choose the free <link><linkText>pricing tier</linkText><title></title></link> of Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: It's free to sign up, and you can choose the free <link><linkText>pricing tier</linkText><title></title></link> of Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Sign into <link><linkText>Azure Preview Portal</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Sign into <link><linkText>Azure Preview Portal</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Create an Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: Create an Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: This is where you'll see data from your app.
trans-unit.target: This is where you'll see data from your app.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add, Developer Services, Application Insights.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add, Developer Services, Application Insights.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Choose your application type.
trans-unit.target: Choose your application type.

trans-unit.source: Open your new resource, and open the Quick Start guide.
trans-unit.target: Open your new resource, and open the Quick Start guide.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Browse, </linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Browse, </linkText>

trans-unit.source: This explains how to install the SDK in your app.
trans-unit.target: This explains how to install the SDK in your app.

trans-unit.source: If it's a web app, you'll also find out how to add the SDK to web pages, and to set up availability tests.
trans-unit.target: If it's a web app, you'll also find out how to add the SDK to web pages, and to set up availability tests.

trans-unit.source: For more details, choose your app type under Get Started in the navigation bar on the left of this page.
trans-unit.target: For more details, choose your app type under Get Started in the navigation bar on the left of this page.
